com.nuance.android.vocalizer

Interface VocalizerEngineListener


  • public interface VocalizerEngineListener
    Interface for clients wishing to listen for engine state changes, as well notifications when speech items begin and end.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nuance Communications

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSpeakElementCompleted(java.lang.String id)
      This method will be called when a speech item has finished speaking.
      void onSpeakElementStarted(java.lang.String id)
      This method will be called when a speech item has just started.
      void onStateChanged(int newState)
      This method will be called whenever the state of the event changes.
      void onVoiceListChanged()
      This method will be called when the Vocalizer Engine detects that the list of available voices has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onStateChanged

        void onStateChanged(int newState)
        This method will be called whenever the state of the event changes.
        Parameters:
        newState - the new state of the engine
        See Also:
        VocalizerEngine.STATE_INITIALIZED, VocalizerEngine.STATE_PAUSED, VocalizerEngine.STATE_READY, VocalizerEngine.STATE_SPEAKING, VocalizerEngine.STATE_UNINITIALIZED, VocalizerEngine.STATE_INIT_ERROR

      • onSpeakElementStarted

        void onSpeakElementStarted(java.lang.String id)
        This method will be called when a speech item has just started. The parameter is the id passed when calling speak.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of this speech item

      • onSpeakElementCompleted

        void onSpeakElementCompleted(java.lang.String id)
        This method will be called when a speech item has finished speaking. The parameter is the id passed when calling speak. Note that if the speech item was interrupted by a call to stop this method won't be called.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of this speech item

      • onVoiceListChanged

        void onVoiceListChanged()
        This method will be called when the Vocalizer Engine detects that the list of available voices has changed. Note that even if re-initialization of the engine has been disabled this method will be called.
        See Also:
        VocalizerEngine.setAutoReinitialize(boolean)
